Class AlphaZeroTrainer

java.lang.Object
AI.alphazero.train.AlphaZeroTrainer
public class AlphaZeroTrainer extends Object
Orchestrates the AlphaZero training pipeline.

The pipeline consists of:

  1. Self-Play: Generating games using the current network and MCTS.
  2. Training: Updating the neural network using the generated examples.
  3. Evaluation: (Optional) Testing the new network against baselines.
This class leverages Java's virtual threads and MultiGpuBatcher to achieve high concurrency for data generation.

  • Constructor Details

    • AlphaZeroTrainer

      public AlphaZeroTrainer(int boardSize)
      Initializes the trainer.

      Attempts to load an existing model ("hex_model_latest.zip") to resume training. If not found, a new model is created. * @param boardSize the size of the board

  • Method Details

    • train

      public void train(int totalGames, int mctsIterations)
      Executes the main training loop.

      Divides the total games into generations (batches). For each generation: 1. Runs massive parallel self-play to collect training data. 2. Pauses data generation. 3. Trains the neural network on the collected data. 4. Saves the model and evaluates performance. * @param totalGames the total number of self-play games to generate

      Parameters:
      mctsIterations - the number of MCTS simulations per move during self-play

    • evaluate

      private void evaluate(int numGames, MultiGpuBatcher batcher)
      Evaluates the current network against a random move baseline.

      Plays a specified number of games, alternating colors, and reports the win rate. * @param numGames the number of evaluation games to play

      Parameters:
      batcher - the MultiGpuBatcher to use for predictions

    • selectMoveFromPolicy

      private Move selectMoveFromPolicy(double[] policy)
      Selects a move based on the provided policy probabilities.
      Parameters:
      policy - the array of move probabilities from the neural network
      Returns:

      private List<TrainingExampleData> selfPlay(AlphaZeroMCTS localMcts, int iterations)
      Performs self-play using MCTS and the current neural network.
      Parameters:
      localMcts - the MCTS instance to use for self-play
      iterations - the number of MCTS simulations per move
      Returns:
      a list of TrainingExampleData generated from the game

      Returns:
      the selected Move

    • trainNetwork

      private void trainNetwork(List<TrainingExampleData> examples)
      Trains the neural network using the provided training examples.

      The training is performed in mini-batches to optimize memory usage. Each mini-batch is converted to INDArray format just-in-time for training, and disposed of immediately after to free GPU memory. * @param examples the list of TrainingExampleData to train on
